May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
Outshone by the other Defend/Probability Control piece in the Uncommons, but it's still better to have so-so PC in Sealed than none. Wish her SAFEGUARD special allowed for adjacent friendlies that didn't share a keyword. If you've got a Past or Future heavyweight, her value skyrockets. If you don't... this is coming up a lot with this set, but, "eh, she's only (about 30) points. Could do worse."
May 3, 2022
Goop
I really like this figure, cheap prob and the ability to protect your own guys from being probbed. You can just carry her around for the defend and the prob and she is definitely worth her points. Too bad she has very limited keywords.
